definitions.definition: A failure ; a mistake or error .
labels: now rare except in miscarriage of justice
definitions.label_groups: now rare except in miscarriage of justice

definitions.definition: The spontaneous natural termination of a pregnancy , especially before it is viable ; the fatal expulsion of a foetus from the womb before term .

main_definition: ( now rare except in miscarriage of justice ) A failure ; a mistake or error . [from 16th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( medicine ) The spontaneous natural termination of a pregnancy , especially before it is viable ; the fatal expulsion of a foetus from the womb before term . [from 17th c.]
